original_title: Professionals’ Trade Union Collective to hold talks with Opposition leader
original_body_lines: The Professionals' Trade Union Collective will meet Opposition Leader Sajith Premadasa today.
Spokesperson of the Federation of University Teachers Association Senior Lecturer Charudatta Ilangasinghe says that issues related to tax will be discussed at the meeting.
He says that this meeting will be held at 12 noon in Parliament today.
The Professionals' Trade Union Collective have also launched a special program to discuss tax issues with all opposition party leaders and party members.
The FUTA Spokesperson says that SJB MPs will participate in this discussion.
He says that the government is yet to provide them with a solution to the tax issue.

Senior Lecturer, Media Spokesperson of the Federation of University Teachers Association Charudatta Ilangasinghe also said that no solution has been received from the government with regards to the tax problem.
Sajith wears a Palestinian scarf to parliament as a mark of solidarity for peace
Guidelines to be issued to government institutions on code of conduct
